verses.roman:
gadā-nirbhinna-hṛdaya
udvaman rudhiraṁ mukhāt
prasārya keśa-bāhv-aṅghrīn
dharaṇyāṁ nyapatad vyasuḥ

synonyms: gadā—by the club; nirbhinna—broken to pieces; hṛdayaḥ—his heart; udvaman—vomiting; rudhiram—blood; mukhāt—from his mouth; prasārya—thrusting outward; keśa—his hair; bāhu—arms; aṅghrīn—and legs; dharaṇyām—on the ground; nyapatat—he fell; vyasuḥ—lifeless.
translation: His heart shattered by the club's blow, Dantavakra vomited blood and fell lifeless to the ground, his hair disheveled and his arms and legs sprawling.
